items.title: KNVB gooit ook al het amateurvoetbal voor dit weekend eruit
items.summary: In navolging van de afgelasting van de vrijdagwedstrijden in het Nederlands betaald voetbal heeft de KNVB ook besloten alle amateurwedstrijden voor dit weekend eruit te gooien. De winterse weersomstandigheden zijn daarvan de oorzaak.

items.title: Loting Copa del Rey: Bar√ßa treft stuntploeg, Real naar Albacete
items.summary: De loting voor de achtste finales in de Spaanse Copa del Rey is woensdagmiddag verricht: Barcelona gaat op bezoek bij Racing Santander en Real Madrid neemt het op tegen Albacete. Ook Atl√©tico Madrid wacht een uitwedstrijd.

items.title: Carrick and Solskjaer frontrunners for caretaker role
items.summary: Michael Carrick and Ole Gunnar Solskjaer emerge as frontrunners to become Manchester United's caretaker manager until the end of the season.

items.title: Spurs head coach Martin Ho: ‚ÄòWe‚Äôre not even 15% of the way to where I want us to be‚Äô
items.summary: Leader of resurgent WSL side on what he demands of players, his relationship with the hierarchy and the change that has surprised him Tottenham have as many points in the Women‚Äôs Super League this term, at the halfway stage, as they accumulated in the entirety of last season. That sentence will offer some satisfaction to their supporters but the head coach, Martin Ho, demonstrates how serious his intentions are when he says: ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre not even 15% of the way to where I want us to be.‚Äù Ho, appointed in July, uses a specific word four times across the course of the conversation: ‚ÄúStandards.‚Äù The former Manchester United assistant coach inherited a team that had finished second from bottom and has Spurs two points off a European place, but he wants them to challenge themselves further. Continue reading...

items.title: Duel tussen NEC en FC Utrecht afgelast, ook KKD gaat vrijdag niet door
items.summary: De KNVB heeft alle wedstrijden in het Nederlands betaald voetbal voor vrijdag afgelast. Door de winterse weersomstandigheden wordt het onverantwoord geacht om te voetballen. Op een later moment wordt beslist over de duels van zaterdag en zondag.

items.title: Slot lyrisch: 'Arsenal heeft het complete pakket'
items.summary: In de aanloop naar de kraker tegen Arsenal van donderdagavond spreekt Arne Slot vol lof over de opponent. 'Hun belangrijkste sterke punt is misschien wel dat ze geen zwakke punten hebben', zei de Liverpool-manager, die begin dit seizoen met 1-0 won van de Londenaren.

items.title: Slot: Ekitike 'hasn't trained' ahead of Arsenal clash
items.summary: Arne Slot has confirmed striker Hugo Ekitike is a doubt to feature for Liverpool against Arsenal in Thursday's Premier League clash at Emirates Stadium.

items.title: Tennis 2026 schedule, Grand Slam dates and tournament calendar for ATP and WTA Tours
items.summary: Keep track of the dates, tournament calendar and latest results for the 2026 ATP and WTA Tours.

items.title: Sammer ziet Duitsland met opvallend Bayern-duo als WK-favoriet
items.summary: Voormalig Duits international Matthias Sammer denkt dat Duitsland komende zomer hoge ogen kan gooien op het WK in de Verenigde Staten, Mexico en Canada. De oud-aanvoerder van Die Mannschaft verwacht dat de Duitsers een extra boost kunnen krijgen door twee extra spelers van Bayern M√ºnchen.

items.summary: Keep track of the latest boxing results and major fights coming up during 2026.

items.title: 'Future of England cricket' - 'diamond' Bethell delivers on supreme talent
items.summary: Jacob Bethell evoked memories of David Gower with his stylish, yet composed, maiden Test century at No 3 for England in the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney, according to Sky Sports' Nasser Hussain.

items.title: Sources: United approach Carrick, Solskjaer
items.summary: Manchester United have held "early-stage informal talks" with several potential interim managers, including Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Michael Carrick, sources have told ESPN.

items.title: Roma chief: Amorim axe has changed Zirkzee plan
items.summary: Roma sporting director Ricky Massara has hinted that a planned move for Joshua Zirkzee may be on the backburner following Ruben Amorim's Manchester United sacking.

items.title: Morocco and Regragui feel pressure before high-profile Afcon quarter-finals
items.summary: Seven of the eight nations have won the tournament before while Mali take on the role of stubborn outsiders A comfortable 3-0 victory for the defending champions, C√¥te d‚ÄôIvoire, over Burkina Faso on Tuesday evening completes the highest-powered set of quarter-finalists the Cup of Nations has ever known. Seven of the last eight are former champions; between them they have won 22 Cups of Nations. It is the first time all eight quarter-finalists are in the top 10 African sides in the Fifa rankings. It‚Äôs been a strangely predictable tournament so far, at least after Ghana failed to qualify; the nearest to a surprise in the last 16 was Mali‚Äôs win over Tunisia and Cameroon‚Äôs victory over South Africa. After the lengthy preamble in a format lacking in jeopardy, the tournament needs the giants to deliver the appropriate payoff. Continue reading...

items.title: Potential roles for both Solskjaer and Carrick as Man Utd plan further talks
items.summary: Manchester United plan to hold further talks with Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Michael Carrick before deciding on who to make their interim head coach, and Sky Sports News has been told there could be a role for both in the new setup.

items.title: Palace would sell Guehi at right price - Glasner
items.summary: Crystal Palace manager Oliver Glasner says the club could sell captain Marc Guehi this month if his asking price is met.

items.title: Football transfer rumours: PSG to move for Rashford? Roma eye Zirkzee?
items.summary: Today‚Äôs rumours are staring at bare walls Another day, another J√∏rgen Strand Larsen rumour. The latest speculation concerning the Wolves striker has Tottenham tussling with Newcastle for his services. With Mohammed Kudus sidelined by injury, Thomas Frank needs attacking reinforcements for his ailing side and Strand Larsen could fit the bill. Newcastle‚Äôs interest remains solid though, and they had scouts at Molineux last weekend, the Newcastle Chronicle reports. Chelsea being Chelsea, Liam Rosenior‚Äôs arrival at Stamford Bridge has excited the gossip peddlers, and there‚Äôs talk in Spain of a cheeky move for Trent Alexander-Arnold. The Spanish outlet Fichajes claims: ‚ÄúSources close to the club suggest that Chelsea could be preparing a multimillion pound offer to try to convince Real Madrid, assuming the deal must be a permanent transfer.‚Äù Though a move for the former Liverpool full-back wouldn‚Äôt particularly fit Chelsea‚Äôs transfer MO. Continue reading...

items.title: Why Liam Rosenior‚Äôs time at Strasbourg was ideal preparation for Chelsea
items.summary: The 41-year-old is at home with young players and, crucially, he is familiar with the demands of Chelsea‚Äôs owners By Get French Football News Liam Rosenior looks up at the towering Strasbourg Kop. He shouts and pleads as he points to his players, demanding the fans applaud them. Met with hostility, boos and jeers in the stands, he cuts a lone figure, one at pains to sow unity at a divided club. Strasbourg had just won the game, beating Le Havre 1-0 earlier this season, but the club‚Äôs fans were in no mood to celebrate. Behind an image are a thousand words, or three banners in this case. One called for the club president Marc Keller to leave Strasbourg; another criticised the bizarre Ish√© Samuels-Smith back-and-forth transfer; and the one to which Rosenior took particular exception concerned his captain, Emmanuel Emegha. It read: ‚ÄúEmegha, pawn of BlueCo, after changing shirts, hand back your armband.‚Äù Emegha had agreed a deal to join Chelsea a few days earlier, once again confirming to Strasbourg fans that they were subservient to ‚Äúbig brother‚Äù Chelsea in the multi-club hierarchy. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Nobody can get hold of him' - what happened to David Batty?
items.summary: England midfielder David Batty vowed to have "nothing to do with the football industry" after retirement. As his former clubs Newcastle and Leeds prepare to meet, BBC Sport asks: What happened to him?

items.title: 'Why Fletcher could be what Man Utd fans have been waiting for'
items.summary: In his BBC Sport column, ex-Premier League boss Tony Pulis explains why Manchester United's interim manager Darren Fletcher would be the perfect choice to take the job on a longer-term basis.
